channel.title: Freeze someone else's computer for a certain amount of time through msn XD
channel.description:
*You'll need MSN, obviously :cool:
Okay. Have people on MSN ever made you mad? By purposely annoying you, or 'stealing' your name? Happened to me. So I 'accidentaly' made an animation (A moving .gif file) and its about... 150x150 pixels. It flashes fast, and also changes color. If you make something thats 150x150+, and make it have lots of color and flash as fast as possible, they will disconnect (And resign in.) That is, if it shows and isn't a white box.
If you want, I attached one of mine to here.
PS: If you do it, it won't disconnect you. PSS: Reason for posting here: A tip XD
Enjoy!
~Lin

item.title: Freeze someone else's computer for a certain amount of time through msn XD
item.dc:creator: @MybJames MybJames
item.description:
@MybJames wrote:

[quote=“kMB, post:21, topic:96597”][quote author=MybJames link=topic=139254.msg1367832#msg1367832 date=1180008688]
Just to let you know, this is a really shitty topic.

Just spam emoticons. Type : D (without the space) into notepad numerous times and copy and paste it into the message box. So just keep hitting ctrl+v.

that > this.
[/quote]
Disabling emotions > that. :P[/quote]
Well yes it does, but this topic is based around an emotion. so BLEH

Read full topic

item.title: Freeze someone else's computer for a certain amount of time through msn XD
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

[quote=“Gotta Catch Them All, post:3, topic:96597”][quote author=Lin link=topic=139254.msg1338824#msg1338824 date=1179563838]
Okay. Have people on MSN ever made you mad? By purposely annoying you, or ‘stealing’ your name? Happened to me. So I ‘accidentaly’ made an animation (A moving .gif file) and its about… 150x150 pixels. It flashes fast, and also changes color. If you make something thats 150x150+, and make it have lots of color and flash as fast as possible, they will disconnect (And resign in.) That is, if it shows and isn’t a white box.

If you want, I attached one of mine to here.

PS: If you do it, it won’t disconnect you.
PSS: Reason for posting here: A tip XD

Enjoy!

~Lin
[/quote]

Why would they log out and in again because you send them a flashing emoticon?[/quote]

Msn is VERY laggy normally, this thing crashes them. I’d just record the packet sent and send it to them so you won’t lag.

Read full topic
